markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 5" pfs="Standard">
[Acid Storm](/Spells.aspx?ID=2339)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Acid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=3" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 256

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Moloch](/Deities.aspx?ID=401), [Thuskchoon](/Deities.aspx?ID=586), [Trelmarixian](/Deities.aspx?ID=393)

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 120 feet

**Area** 20-foot [burst](/Rules.aspx?ID=2385)

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Defense**
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=2297) reflex

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You evoke a storm of acid rain that pelts the area for the spell’s duration. A creature that begins its turn in the area takes 3d8 [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=524) damage (basic Reflex save).

---
**Heightened (+2)** The damage increases by 1d8.
name: Acid Storm
